item.title: 5.4.1 Camera Introduction
item.description: ‚ùó Only vehicles with cameras have data. Camera supports businesses or customers to monitor, manage equipment and review videos and images if something goes wrong. üëâ More cameras here

item.title: 5.4.2 Photo
item.description: Photo history # To view the photo history report, do the following: Click on Report > Camera > Photo history. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time you want to view the image. Number plate: Select the device to view. Camera: Select the camera you want to view (select one or more cameras).

item.title: 5.4.3 Photo List
item.description: List photos # To view the photo history report, do the following: Click on Report > Camera > List photos. 1. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time you want to view the image. Number plate: Select the device to view. Camera: Select the camera you want to view (select one or more cameras).
